name: Space Gaze VR
description:
Space Gaze is a non-linear interactive Virtual Reality experience in which players can explore different locations in cyberspace, based on sub-conscious decision making.

In VR, the field of view is boundless. While the player is dancing in a virtual disco surrounded by other creatures, a gaze tracking system measures where exactly the individual’s gaze is focused, this data is then analysed to determine the person’s highest level of interest. Based on the players unconscious decisions, players will visit new planets, where living beings will be welcome them. Let's boogy!! 

Availabe for HTC Vive.
